long_description: home-rail's urban glass railing system is streamlined and cutting-edge to differentiate it from the conventional glass railing systems. five and six foot high wind wall/privacy walls. our glass railing provides uninterrupted views of your outdoors. home-rail's double top railing's charm is in its clean lines and added sturdiness. home-rail can produce a stunning railing system solution to suit your home. all of home-rails railing systems are produced with high strength aluminum alloys and power coated finishing which assures sturdiness, weather resistance and colour retention. home-rail's railing systems are simple to erect utilizing pee-engineered components that snap and screw together. visit our calgary showroom today or contact us to learn more.

generated_description: home-rail's, legally known as calgary glass railing home rail ltd., is a company based in calgary, alberta, specializing in the design and manufacture of aluminum, vinyl, and composite decking systems, as well as various types of railing systems. the company offers a range of products including straight and wide picket railings, urban glass railings, topless glass railings, wind and privacy walls, glass railings, criss cross railings, aluminum fencing, fascia-mounted picket and glass railings, double top railings, and composite decking. home-rail's products are known for their durability, low maintenance, and environmentally friendly features, featuring a powder-coated finish. the company provides both commercial and residential solutions, catering to both professional installation and diy projects.
